mainText:
I'm only 15, I know many people might think I would be too young to understand what it means when a man such as Steve jobs dies (RIP)
, but I understand very well and I wish to send my condolences and my respects to his family. I also wish his family would continue living a happy life because thanx to Mr Jobs I have had a fun and creative life thanks to his inventions and all the thought he put it into everything he had made and help create.
author: Yusuf
